sas-esd.emptyStateDescription: There is no ESD configured for this product, yet.
sas-esd.emptyStateSerialDescription: There are no serial numbers configured for this ESD product

notification.error: There was an error while saving your serials

sas-esd-modal-csv.checkboxLabel: Does the CSV file has a header?

success.ready: The CSV is ready for the import.

textAreaSerialNumber.label: Serial numbers
textAreaSerialNumber.placeholder: New line for each serial number

downloadLimit.title: Download limit
downloadLimit.downloadLimitPlaceholder: Input your custom download limit number for this ESD

sas-esd.alertMailSetting: You need to set a sales channel for the Email Templates, so Shopware is able to send a confirmation email with the download link or the serial number.Otherwise, the customer will get no email. Read our Plugin Documentation on how to assign an Email template.
sas-esd.alertDownloadMailSetting: You need to set a sales channel for the Email Templates, so Shopware is able to send a confirmation email with the download link. Otherwise, the customer will get no email. Read our Plugin Documentation on how to assign an Email template.
sas-esd.alertSerialMailSetting: You need to set a sales channel for the Email Templates, so Shopware is able to send a confirmation email with the serial number. Otherwise, the customer will get no email. Read our Plugin Documentation on how to assign an Email template.

esdMail.alertSendMailDownloadSuccessMessage: Esd email download was sent successfully
esdMail.alertSendMailSerialSuccessMessage: ESD email serial was sent successfully
